          <title>
            <string language="en">Absorption and reflection of sounds from different surfaces.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Absorption und Reflexion der Töne von den 
unterschiedlichen Oberflächen.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Absorption et réflexion des bruits de 
différentes surfaces.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Absorption e reflexão dos sons das superfícies 
diferentes.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assorbimento e riflessione dei suoni dalle 
superfici differenti.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απορρόφηση και αντανάκλαση των ήχων από τις 
διαφορετικές επιφάνειες.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Absorción y reflexión de sonidos de diversas 
superficies.</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows that sound can either be absorbed or reflected depending on the surface.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hard surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">smooth surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Ton entweder abhängig von der
Oberfläche aufgesogen werden oder reflektiert werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure prouve que le bruit peut être absorbé ou 
reflété selon la surface.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura mostra que o som pode ser absorvido ou 
refletido dependendo da superfície.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura indica che il suono può essere assorbito o 
riflesso secondo la superficie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός δείχνει ότι ο ήχος μπορεί είτε να 
απορροφηθεί είτε να απεικονιστεί ανάλογα με την επιφάνεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura muestra que el sonido se puede absorber o 
reflejar dependiendo de la superficie.</string>
          </description>
